skillTree.localised_description: “If a siege cannot be won, then we shall cause as much mayhem as we can!”

skillTree.localised_description: The Goddess of War has blessed this one for his combat prowess.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.localised_description: With a roaring war cry, these men will stand their ground and let not one inch fall to their foes.

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit causes additional damage when attacking charging enemies.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

skillTree.localised_description: Almost all the gold earned from their battles and contracts go to the Temple of Lucan & Luccina in the hopes of appeasing the Twin-Headed Leopard for their past transgressions.
Like any good mercenary, Leopoldo and his men will do almost anything for the right price.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +15% after winning a battle
Campaign movement range: +25% after winning a battle
Campaign movement range: +40% after winning a battle

skillTree.localised_description: No matter the odds, the Leopard Company will hold fast against any who come at them.

effects.description:
Enables attribute "Unbreakable" for the Leopard Company
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: Leopoldo’s devout faith in the Leopard and the gods of Tilea lends him an almost supernatural tenacity that inspires all to fight on, regardless of their own faith.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: The Leopard Company does not care about where you are from or who you fought for in the past; as long as you are resolute and good with a pike, you are welcome into their ranks.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -20% for Mercenaries
	(armies in local province)
Global recruitment duration: -1 turn for all units

Upkeep: -30% for Mercenaries
	(armies in local province)
Global recruitment duration: -1 turn for all units

skillTree.localised_description: "Stiffen the sinews, summon the blood, disguise fair nature with hard-favoured rage and imitate the actions of the Leopard!"

effects.description:
No upkeep for the Leopard Company
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment Cost: -100% for the Leopard Company
	(Lord's army)

Enables attribute "Immune to Flanking" for the Leopard Company
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit takes no penalties when flanked.

effects.description:
Melee Defence: +35 for the Leopard Company
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
Although precision in missile combat is something that can be learned, this one was born with a high degree of natural talent.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
Don't go into the woods today. No, seriously, don't.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Only the foolish go on the hunt without supplies and a cast-iron plan.
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: “We march to war for our Prince, and the two-headed Leopard.”

skillTree.localised_description: Honest Tilea-forged steel is all a soldier could ask when confronting the myriad foes in battle.

skillTree.localised_description: Lorenzo has destroyed thousands upon thousands of troops with his devastating barrages. His artillery tactics are considered some of the greatest in the Old World, though the Dwarves disagree.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
Revered by the masses, such a celebrated leader will inspire many new recruits.
The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.
It is said that Sigmar would bear a mortal wound and carry on fighting; this champion follows the hallowed Warrior-God.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.
Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%
Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: "Ever thought about joining the Elector's troops, chief? You'd make a good soldier alright."

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

items.colour_text: The signature pelt of the Leopard Company, recognisable enough that wiser men avoid fighting them directly. Leopoldo’s pelt in particular is enchanted with powerful wards.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +4 for Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +12% after winning a battle

items.colour_text: A burnished brass plate with an ornate muscle cuirass and an embossed leopard face. A sturdy piece of armour for a stalwart captain.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)
Campaign movement range: +12% after winning a battle

items.colour_text: Unlike the rest of his Company, Leopoldo carries a sharp, curved blade and a fashioned gold pistol, both custom-made and augmented using gold from his contracts.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases as the unit takes damage

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +12% after winning a battle

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Leopoldo di Lucano was once the Captain of the Royal Guard of the Temple of Lucan & Luccina until they rebelled against the newly crowned Prince Lorenzo Lupo, who claimed descent from both Lucan and Luccina. Leopoldo and the guards who survived the rebellion formed the Leopard Company and have since become renowned for their skill and fortitude across the Old World.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
